name: GUAR_PMT_SCORE_HX
description: Contains information on the guarantor Payment History Score. Each line contains factors that contributed to the score for one billing system for one guarantor.

columns.name: ACCOUNT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the guarantor record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: LAST_CALCULATED_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The last instant at which this payment history score was updated.

columns.name: BILLING_SYSTEM_C_NAME
columns.description: The billing system of the payment history score in this line.

columns.name: SCORE
columns.description: The payment history score for a guarantor based on their self-pay history (PB, HB or EB score).

columns.name: NUM_ACCTS
columns.description: Number of accounts used to calculate the guarantor's payment history score.

columns.name: NUM_BAD_DEBT_ACCTS
columns.description: The number of accounts sent to bad debt in the history range for the guarantor's payment history score.

columns.name: BAD_DEBT_BALANCE
columns.description: The total balance sent to bad debt for this guarantor in the payment history score's history window.

columns.name: NUM_UNCOLL_ACCTS
columns.description: Number of accounts with uncollectable balance for the guarantor in the payment history score history window.

columns.name: UNCOLL_BALANCE
columns.description: The total uncollectable balance for this guarantor in the payment history score history window.

columns.name: AVG_SP_LEVEL_C_NAME
columns.description: The guarantor's average self-pay level in the PB payment history score history window.

columns.name: MAX_SP_LEVEL_C_NAME
columns.description: The highest self-pay level at account close (or bad debt outsource) for the guarantor in the payment history score history window.

columns.name: NUM_MISSED_PAYMENTS
columns.description: The number of missed payments by the guarantor in the payment history score history range.

columns.name: NUM_MISSED_PP_PAYMENTS
columns.description: The number of missed payment plan payments by the guarantor in the payment history score history window.

columns.name: HAS_PAID_ONLINE_YN
columns.description: Whether the guarantor has paid online to this billing system in the payment history score history window.

columns.name: LAST_CALCULATED_LOCAL_DTTM
columns.description: The last instant at which this payment history score was updated.
